creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Amy Kasai
description: hunter green formation along R half of paper with intaglio, feathered hash marks at LR and center; brown hooked form across top and UR; formation of scattered grey geometric forms URQ; organic and geometric cluster of black shapes at center and UR; overlapping irregular blue shapes at center; large grey background at R; jagged, irregular brown shape at bottom
signed: bottom margin, in pencil: [Rikio Taka / Music (Who Play, A) / \'60]
title: Music (Who Play A)
